comment: Корапченный член сопротивления (поднят флаг CorruptedResistants) по клику

languages.text: "Прирезать всех их, всех до единого. Если выбраться можно только по горе трупов — пускай. Вольный Торговец указал{mf||а} мне верный путь!"

traits.locale_text: "Прирезать всех их, всех до единого. Если выбраться можно только по горе трупов — пускай. Вольный Торговец указал{mf||а} мне верный путь!"

languages.text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
languages.original_text: "Прирезать всех их, всех до единого. Если выбраться можно только по горе трупов — пускай. Вольный Торговец указал{mf||а} мне верный путь!"

traits.locale_text: "Must cut them all, every last one. If the only way out is over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
"Must cut them all, every last one. If the only way out is over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
"Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
"Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
"Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"
"Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

languages.text: 「最後のひとりまで全員、切り刻まなければならない。死体の山を越えるしか道がないのなら、そうするとしよう。自由開拓者が道を示してくれたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: 「最後のひとりまで全員、切り刻まなければならない。死体の山を越えるしか道がないのなら、そうするとしよう。自由開拓者が道を示してくれたんだ！」

languages.text: “必须把他们全杀了，一个不剩。如果只有尸山血海才是唯一的出路，那就让他们血流成河吧！行商浪人已经为我指明了道路！”
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: “必须把他们全杀了，一个不剩。如果只有尸山血海才是唯一的出路，那就让他们血流成河吧！行商浪人已经为我指明了道路！”

languages.text: «Debemos acabar con todos y cada uno de ellos. Si la única salida está sobre un montón de cadáveres, que así sea. ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me ha mostrado el camino!».
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: «Debemos acabar con todos y cada uno de ellos. Si la única salida está sobre un montón de cadáveres, que así sea. ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me ha mostrado el camino!».

languages.text: "Ich muss sie alle erstechen, jeden einzelnen. Wenn man hier nur über einen Berg aus Leichen hinauskommt, dann ist das eben so. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat mir den Weg gezeigt!"
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss sie alle erstechen, jeden einzelnen. Wenn man hier nur über einen Berg aus Leichen hinauskommt, dann ist das eben so. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat mir den Weg gezeigt!"

languages.text: « On doit tous les massacrer jusqu'au dernier. Si on doit escalader une montagne de cadavres pour nous enfuir, qu'il en soit ainsi. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} m'a montré la voie ! »
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: « On doit tous les massacrer jusqu'au dernier. Si on doit escalader une montagne de cadavres pour nous enfuir, qu'il en soit ainsi. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} m'a montré la voie ! »

languages.text: "Hepsini kesmek lazım, dibine kadar hem de. Tek çıkış yoluna ulaşmak için bir yığın cesedi aşmak gerekiyorsa öyle olsun. Hür Tacir bana yolu gösterdi!"
languages.original_text: "Must cut them all, down to the last one. If the only way out takes us over a mound of corpses, so be it. The Rogue Trader has shown me the path!"

traits.locale_text: "Hepsini kesmek lazım, dibine kadar hem de. Tek çıkış yoluna ulaşmak için bir yığın cesedi aşmak gerekiyorsa öyle olsun. Hür Tacir bana yolu gösterdi!"
